root.name: Hello Kitty's Cube Frenzy
root.description: StoryHello Kitty's island vacation is interrupted when Badtz Maru arrives and reeks havoc. Hello Kitty must then collect items, seemingly to break the spell, and return to her well deserved vacation. GameplayIn each level, you must guide Hello Kitty to collect every item. Using blocks and objects in Tetris style gameplay you build the environment to allow Hello Kitty access to items. Other characters may appear to reshape the blocks and create further challenge. CharactersThroughout the game, many characters from the Sanrio universe will appear. Floral ResortChinese RobeKimono TownBeach GirlSoccer StadiumWestern StoryAngel WaltzSpace TravelWedding MarchSnow Mountain PochaccoPatty and JimmyPurinKiki and Lala ModesSingle Player Campaign Versus
